/circle6 Y ou must greet every pregnant woman in a friendly manner at each visit.
/circle6 Listen to the woman's problems and concerns, and counsel her and her relatives. 
Remember, all women need social/psychological support during pregnancy.
/circle6 Th  e antenatal examination should be carried out at an appropriate place where there is 
enough privacy for conducting abdominal palpation.
/circle6 All fi  ndings must be accurately recorded.
